articles.title: How pro-choice messaging on abortion is evolving.
articles.description: American activists have a lot to learn from Ireland and Argentina.

articles.description: Consumption of horse meat has been growing globally since the 1990s. It is considered a delicacy in parts of France Italy, Holland, Switzerland and Belgium and commonly served in China, Russia, Central Asia, Mexico, Argentina and Japan.

articles.title: Contepomi to leave Leinster for Argentina this summer
articles.description: Leinster have confirmed that Felipe Contepomi will leave the province's coaching staff at the end of the season as he prepares to take up a role with his native Argentina.
articles.content:
Leinster have confirmed that Felipe Contepomi will leave the province's coaching staff at the end of the season as he prepares to take up a role with his native Argentina.

articles.title: ‘Don’t cry for me Argentina’, says Ryanair boss as hopes of €100m shares windfall fade
articles.description: RYANAIR boss Michael O’Leary says he has been the “worst-paid CEO” in Europe’s airline sector over the past two years and thinks the cards are stacked against his chances of reaping a €100m share windfall from the airline in 2024.
articles.content: Ryanair Group CEO Michael O'Leary used his fortune to fund his racing passion. Pictured at Cheltenham in March this year, with the winner of the Glenfarclas Cross Country Chase Delta Work (left) and runner-up Tiger Roll. Photo by David Fitzgerald/Spo... [2742 chars]

articles.title: Felipe Contepomi to leave Leinster set-up after ‘brilliant opportunity’ to return to Argentina as Pumas’ assistant coach
articles.description: After previously pouring cold water on the prospect, the lure of home has proved too alluring for Felipe Contepomi as confirmation arrived this morning that the Leinster assistant coach will reunite with his former boss Michael Cheika as the Pumas’ assistant coach.

articles.description: Jermell Charlo knocked out Argentina's Brian Castano to become the first undisputed super welterweight champion in history on Saturday.
articles.content:

articles.title: ‘Paulo Londra: Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 23’ Tops Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: “Paulo Londra: BZRP Music Sessions, Vol. 23” by Paulo Londra and Bizarrap tops the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart for a second week.
